name: CJ Ting
bio: I like Elixir for its awesome functional programming features and elegant syntax, it really makes programming enjoyable.

name: Ian Fosbery
bio: I've been a programmer for over 15 years. I've really gotten into functional programming in recent years, which is how I've come to love Elixir so much. Concurrency, fp, the Erlang VM - what's not to love?!

name: Fernando Mendes
bio: I'm a backend developer currently working with Elixir (and Ruby at times!). I've always been a huge fan of functional programming and the elegant syntax, performance and knack for distributed systems has made it my favorite language.
